Arizona Arizona State and Utah are the latest schools to jump ship from the Pac12 and join the Big  in  PERIOD

The Big  released an official statement on its Twitter account Friday night welcoming those three schools for the  academic year PERIOD The additions increased the Big 12s membership to  teams PERIOD

 commissioner Brett Yormark said in a statement PERIOD 

Oregon and Washington received approval on Friday to leave the Pac12 for the Big Ten in  and Colorado already announced plans to be part of the Big  next season PERIOD

UCLA and Southern California began the exodus with their announcement last year to leave the Pac12 for the Big Ten in  PERIOD

The four remaining Pac12 schools  Washington State Oregon State Cal and Stanford  are left to consider their options PERIOD
